## insertDocumentLink() function

Inserts a CSS link into the document if it doesn't already exist.

**Signature:**

```typescript
insertDocumentLink: (href: string) => void
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

href


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The URL of the CSS file to insert.

void
